structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A ORGANIZATION OF GOVERNMENT IN CITIES

law.catch_line: Present organizational structure of city to remain until changed under this chapter -- Status of ordinances not in conflict with chapter.
law.text: The present organizational structure of each city shall remain in force until changed under this chapter. All ordinances and resolutions presently in force in each city not in conflict with the provisions of KRS 83A.010 to 83A.170 shall remain in force until changed.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 435, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980.
